text.more:
Graph showing all county and what Duchy, Kingdom or Empire they belong to. And what Cultue and Religion they have at the start of the game.
As Duchy, Kingdom and Empire are legal titles rather then geographical descriptors they are not linked together in this graph.

The layout is from the plugin "Circle Pack Layout", available in Tools submenu inside Gephi
text.intro:
Graph showing all Countys and to what they are linked.
The nodecircles are sorted in a hierarchy based firstly on Modularity, second on Culture and third on Religion.
text.title: CK3-County-Network
